project.description: Single job to run the manage project: /mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm

com.vectorcast.plugins.vectorcastexecuti.unixCommand:
export PATH=/home/vectorindia/gcc-4.1.2/bin:$PATH
export VECTORCAST_DIR=/mnt/nfs/shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/VCAST_COVERAGE/VCAST_LINUX
rm -rf $VECTORCAST_DIR cp -r $LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR/* $VECTORCAST_DIR/. export VCAST_RPTS_PRETTY_PRINT_HTML=FALSE cd ${LINUX_HARVESTER_DIR}
$VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --status $VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --release-locks $VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --disable-instrument-in-place
git checkout -- harvester/inc/vcVersion.h git stash git pull origin develop
# change the vctools version to the git commit id export COMMIT_ID=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) sed -i "s/.*#define _VCTOOLS_VERSION_.*/#define _VCTOOLS_VERSION_ \"${COMMIT_ID}\"/" harvester/inc/vcVersion.h
rm vcshell.* $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell bash "./build.sh --enable_threads"
$VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --enable-instrument-in-place cd cover $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester cover instrument statement cd .. ./build_instrumented.sh
cd build ./install.sh || if [[ $? == 1 ]]; then true else false fi
